snippet: American Airlines' bag delivery lets you skip the carousel, Starbucks customers will eventually be able to pay by saying their name, Mitt Romney's job growth promises and other consumer-focused news from today's Times.
abstract: American Airlines' bag delivery lets you skip the carousel, Starbucks customers will eventually be able to pay by saying their name, Mitt Romney's job growth promises and other consumer-focused news from today's Times.

headline.main: Wednesday Reading: Airline's Bag Delivery Service Lets You Skip the Carousel
